name: People 4.0
goal:
People 4.0 is part of the Forte Group. Amongst other activities, People 4.0 adds experienced interim management to the team of its clients.
Forte is the leading European specialist in Industrial Sales & Marketing 4.0. We offer career and team mentoring for sales & marketing managers, as well as executive education to enlighten their bosses. And, we help marketing managers & communications coordinators create brands that are real ecosystem-magnets.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Food Safety, Public Health, Transport
euInitiatives: Energy Union, Emissions Trading Scheme, Circular Economy, Ecodesign, Food Waste
